title: Resolution in game
body: I have a problem with my resoultion in the game, when i get into the game my resoltion is on 1940x1080 but my computer cant run that so what i always did was changing my resolution to the game run better, but now with the actualization of windows 10 i cant change the resolution of the game because it does not shows other options other than 1940x1080, what can i do?

replies.body: With absolutely no information about the computer, nobody can help.
